tool_description: A scrapper / scraper API to get the latest news every minute from more than 30 sources all over the world, with plans to increase the number of sources to hundreds over time.

api_list.name: Sources List (New)
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to get the list of all news sources.

api_list.name: Filter { By Category & Source } (New)
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to get the recent 50 news items from a specific category and a specific source.

required_parameters.name: cat
required_parameters.description: The category of news to filter by.

required_parameters.name: source
required_parameters.description: The source of news to filter by.

api_list.name: By Source (New)
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to get the recent 50 news items from a specific source.

required_parameters.name: source
required_parameters.description: The source of news to retrieve.

api_list.name: by Category
api_list.description: Get the recent 50 news items by category.

required_parameters.name: cat
required_parameters.description: The category of news to retrieve.

api_list.name: categories
api_list.description: Get the list of Moka News categories.
